item.title: 据 The Information 报道，亚马逊 Prime Video 将重点转向体育直播以提高利润
item.description: 据 The Information 周五报道，亚马逊的 Prime Video 已将战略重点转向体育直播，而不再关注原创电视节目和电影，以实现公司内部的利润目标。【原文：Amazon's Prime Video has shifted its strategic focus towards live sports and away from original television shows and movies, seeking to meet internal corporate profit targets, The Information reported on Friday.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 博鳌亚洲银行调查显示，半数投资者希望在对冲基金上投入更多资金
item.description: 在接受美国银行大宗交易经纪部门调查的全球投资者中，有一半人计划今年向对冲基金增拨资金，37%的人希望保持不变。【原文：Half of the global investors surveyed by Bank of America's prime brokerage department plan to allocate more money to hedge funds this year, while 37% wanted no change.】

item.title: 路易斯安那州的 Argent 液化天然气公司与孟加拉国政府达成协议
item.description: 阿根廷液化天然气公司（Argent LNG）周五发表声明说，该公司正在路易斯安那州开发年产 2500 万公吨的液化天然气（LNG）设施，并已与孟加拉国政府签署了一项不具约束力的协议，每年将购买多达 500 万公吨的液化天然气（LNG）。【原文：Argent LNG, which is developing a 25 million metric tonnes per annum (MTPA) LNG facility in Louisiana, has signed a non-binding agreement with the government of Bangladesh to purchase up to 5 million metric tons of liquefied natural gas (LNG) annually, the company said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 分析师称，IPO热情高涨，但要注意估值问题
item.description: 华尔街分析师说，Venture Global 雄心勃勃的估值目标受到的冷遇表明，公司在上市时需要设定切合实际的预期，这也可能是一个信号，表明新股发行的复苏可能是谨慎的。【原文：The tepid reception to Venture Global's ambitious valuation target shows companies need to set realistic expectations when going public, Wall Street analysts said, and could be a signal that the recovery in new offerings may be a cautious one.】

item.title: 特朗普再次呼吁欧佩克降低油价
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五再次呼吁欧佩克（OPEC）削减石油价格，以损害石油大国俄罗斯的财政，并帮助结束乌克兰战争。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday reiterated his call for OPEC to cut oil prices to hurt oil-rich Russia's finances and help bring an end to the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: Affirm 扩大与自由互惠投资公司的合作关系
item.description: 现购现付贷款公司 Affirm Holdings 与投资公司 Liberty Mutual Investments (LMI) 周五表示，双方已扩大了资本合作关系。【原文：Buy now, pay later lender Affirm Holdings has expanded its capital partnership with investment firm Liberty Mutual Investments (LMI), the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 尽管有特朗普的命令，但放弃 DEI 可能会让公司陷入法律纠纷
item.description: 专家表示，那些为避免特朗普政府审查而缩减工作场所多元化努力的美国公司，可能会使自己面临更多工人歧视诉讼。【原文：U.S. companies that scale back workplace diversity efforts to avoid scrutiny from the Trump administration may be exposing themselves to more discrimination lawsuits by workers, experts said.】

item.title: 美国 1 月消费者信心下滑；12 个月通胀预期上升
item.description: 由于对劳动力市场的担忧，以及如果唐纳德-特朗普总统的新政府继续推进对进口商品征收关税的计划，商品价格可能会上涨，美国消费者情绪在1月份出现了六个月来的首次疲软。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment weakened in January for the first time in six months amid worries about the labor market and potential higher prices for goods if President Donald Trump's new administration presses ahead with planned tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 宝马与中国电动汽车制造商一起向欧盟法院提起关税诉讼
item.description: 据欧盟法院网站上的一份文件显示，宝马已联合中国生产商向欧盟法院（CJEU）提起诉讼，反对欧盟对中国生产的电动汽车（EV）征收关税。【原文：BMW has joined Chinese producers in filing a challenge at the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) against EU tariffs on China-made electric vehicles (EVs), according to a filing on the court's website.】

item.title: Venture Global 股票开盘价可能比首次公开发行价高出最多 6
item.description: Venture Global LNG 的股票周五在纽约证券交易所首次开盘时将比发行价高出 6%。【原文：Venture Global LNG's shares were set to open up to 6% above their offer price in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 12 月成屋销售升至 10 个月新高
item.description: 美国现房销售在 12 月份增至 10 个月来的最高点，但进一步的增长可能会受到抵押贷款利率和房价上涨的限制，这使得许多潜在购房者保持观望。【原文：U.S. existing home sales increased to a 10-month high in December, but further gains are likely to be limited by elevated mortgage rates and house prices, which are keeping many prospective buyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 国际纸业公司获得欧盟批准，以 72 亿美元收购 DS Smith
item.description: 总部设在美国的国际纸业公司以 58 亿英镑（72 亿美元）收购英国竞争对手 DS Smith，并承诺出售资产以解决竞争问题，获得欧盟批准。【原文：U.S.-based International Paper secured EU clearance for its 5.8-billion-pound ($7.2 billion) acquisition of UK rival DS Smith with a pledge to sell assets to address competition concerns.】

item.title: 特朗普的首个政策举措让加密货币市场失去动力
item.description: 即使在唐纳德-特朗普总统下令成立一个新的工作小组，负责提出新的加密货币规则并探索美国加密货币储备的可能性之后，加密货币市场周五仍保持稳定，低于近期高点。【原文：Crypto markets steadied on Friday, still holding below recent highs even after President Donald Trump ordered the creation of a new working group, tasked with proposing new crypto rules and exploring the possibility of a U.S. cryptocurrency stockpile.】

item.title: 美国 1 月商业活动创九个月新低；招聘加速
item.description: 由于物价压力上升，1月份美国商业活动放缓至第九个月低点，但企业报告称增加了招聘，这支持了美联储今年降息的谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. business activity slowed to a ninth-month low in January amid rising price pressures, but firms reported boosting hiring, supporting the Federal Reserve's cautious approach to cutting interest rates this year.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI 面临印度全球出版商的新版权案件
item.description: 印度图书出版商及其国际同行已在新德里对 OpenAI 提起版权诉讼，一位代表周五表示，这是一系列寻求阻止 ChatGPT 聊天机器人访问专有内容的全球案件中的最新一起。【原文：Indian book publishers and their international counterparts have filed a copyright lawsuit against OpenAI in New Delhi, a representative said on Friday, the latest in a series of global cases seeking to stop the ChatGPT chatbot accessing proprietary content.】

item.title: 特朗普政府审查美国自动紧急制动规则
item.description: 美国一家汽车安全机构周五表示，它正在重新考虑前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）政府制定的一项具有里程碑意义的规定，即要求到2029年，几乎所有的新车和卡车都必须配备先进的自动紧急制动系统。【原文：A U.S. auto safety agency said Friday it is reconsidering a landmark rule from the administration of former President Joe Biden requiring nearly all new cars and trucks by 2029 to have advanced automatic emergency braking systems.】

item.title: 美达今年资本支出投资高达 650 亿美元
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周五在 Facebook 发布的一篇文章中表示，2025 年将投资 600 亿至 650 亿美元用于资本支出。【原文：Meta Platforms will invest $60 billion to $65 billion in capital expenditure in 2025, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said in a Facebook post on Friday.】

item.title: Meta、TikTok 和 X 将加入欧盟对德国大选的压力测试
item.description: 欧盟发言人周五表示，欧盟委员会将于下周对大型社交媒体平台进行压力测试，以了解这些平台在下月德国大选前是否采取了足够措施来应对虚假信息。【原文：The European Commission will hold a stress test with large social media platforms next week to see whether they have done enough to counter disinformation in the run-up to next month's German election, an EU spokesperson said on Friday.】

item.title: AT&T 通过向 Reign Capital 出售-回租房地产获得 8.5 亿美元融资
item.description: AT&T 周五表示，已通过向房地产开发公司 Reign Capital 售后回租其闲置的中央办公设施（容纳其传统铜缆网络）的方式，获得了 8.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：AT&T said on Friday it has secured $850 million through the sale-leaseback of its underused central office facilities that house its legacy copper networks to real estate development firm Reign Capital.】

item.title: HCA 医疗保健公司预计 2025 年利润高于预期
item.description: HCA 医疗保健公司周五预测 2025 年的利润将高于预期，预计医疗程序的需求将增加，成本将降低。【原文：HCA Healthcare on Friday forecast 2025 profit above estimates, expecting elevated demand for medical procedures and lower costs.】

item.title: 特朗普商务部主管人选霍华德-卢特尼克公布财务信息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的商务部领导人选霍华德-卢特尼克周五在参议院举行听证会确认他担任商务部领导之前，披露了他的财务控股和资产情况。【原文：Howard Lutnick, President Donald Trump's nominee to lead the Commerce Department, on Friday disclosed his financial holdings and assets ahead of a Senate hearing to confirm him for the role.】

item.title: Signify 首席执行官表示，可以应对美国可能征收的关税
item.description: 荷兰照明公司 Signify 首席执行官周五表示，预计美国可能征收的新进口关税不会对公司造成很大的财务影响。【原文：Dutch lighting company Signify does not expect a big financial impact from possible new U.S. import tariffs, its chief executive said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧佩克+尚未对特朗普呼吁降低油价做出反应
item.description: 欧佩克+"尚未对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求降低油价的呼吁做出反应，该组织的代表指出，已经制定了一项计划，从四月份开始提高石油产量。【原文：OPEC+ has yet to react to a call from U.S. President Donald Trump for lower oil prices, with delegates from the group pointing to a plan already in place to start raising oil output from April.】

item.title: IPO 市场卷土重来：近期美国主要上市公司业绩如何
item.description: 在商业友好型的唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫、利率下降和股市风险情绪重燃的推动下，美国首次公开募股市场预计将在2025年迎来井喷。【原文：The U.S. IPO market is expected to see a blowout 2025, fueled by the return of business-friendly Donald Trump to the White House, declining interest rates and a renewed risk-on sentiment in equity markets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行力推数字欧元以应对特朗普的加密货币政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）周五表示，欧元区银行需要一种数字欧元来应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推动推广稳定币（一种通常与美元挂钩的加密货币）的举措。【原文：Euro zone banks need a digital euro to respond to U.S. President Donald Trump's push to promote stablecoins, a type of cryptocurrency typically pegged to the U.S. dollar, European Central Bank board member Piero Cipollone said on Friday.】

item.title: 由于 5G 支出巨大，Verizon 预测年度自由现金流和利润均将下滑
item.description: 周五，威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications）预测年度自由现金流和利润将低于华尔街预期，因为这家美国电信巨头斥巨资扩大高速互联网服务，并在日趋饱和的无线市场上吸引客户。【原文：Verizon Communications forecast annual free cash flow and profit below Wall Street estimates on Friday, as the U.S. telecom major spends heavily to expand high-speed internet services and attract customers in a saturating wireless market.】

item.title: 假日消费旺季使美国运通利润大增
item.description: 周五，美国运通公布第四季度利润大增 12%，原因是假日期间有更多消费者刷卡旅游和网购。【原文：American Express reported a 12% jump in fourth-quarter profit on Friday, as more consumers swiped cards during the holiday season for travel and online shopping.】

item.title: Investcorp 可能考虑在 3-5 年内上市，着眼于美国的退休储蓄
item.description: Investcorp 副董事长周五表示，Investcorp 可能考虑在未来三到五年内公开上市，这家中东最大的另类投资公司的目标是将其管理资产翻一番，达到 1,000 亿美元。【原文：Investcorp could consider a public listing in the next three to five years, its vice chairman said on Friday, as the Middle East's biggest alternative investment firm targets a doubling of its assets under management to $100 billion.】

item.title: 特朗普政策的不确定性导致期货下跌；等待数据和收益
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的不确定性占据上风，同时投资者也在等待可能揭示经济状况的数据和企业财报，美国股指期货周五下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped on Friday, as uncertainty about President Donald Trump's trade policies prevailed, while investors also awaited data and corporate earnings reports that could throw light on the state of the economy.】

item.title: 独家报道美国举报人称万事达卡和维萨卡未能阻止为 OnlyFans 上的儿童性虐待材料付款
item.description: 万事达卡和威士卡未能阻止它们的支付网络对热门网站 OnlyFans 上的儿童性虐待材料和性交易收益进行洗钱，据此前未披露的举报人向美国财政部金融犯罪部门提交的指控称。【原文：Mastercard and Visa failed to stop their payment networks from laundering proceeds from child sexual abuse material and sex trafficking on the popular website OnlyFans, according to allegations in a previously undisclosed whistleblower complaint filed with the U.S. Treasury’s financial crimes unit.】
